content: निर्यासः, --सं {@--1@} Exudation of trees or plants, gum, juice, resin; शालनिर्यासगंधिभिः <ls>R. 1. 38</ls>; <ls>Ms. 5. 6.</ls> {@--2@} Extract, infusion, decoction. {@--3@} Any thick fluid substance.
